CLR $t2 is
ADD $t2, $zero, $zero
0000 0000 0000 0000 0111 0000 0000 0001
ALUI--ZERO--ZERO--T2-----7'b0----ADD---
00000000000000000111000000000001 = 0x00007001

LA $t0, subr is 
LUI $at, 0x0
1011 0000 0011 1010 0000 0000 0000 0000
LUI---ZERO--AT----(0x0)----------------
10110000001110100000000000000000 = 0xb03a0000

and
ORI $at, $at, 0x28
0011 0111 0111 1010 0000 0000 0010 1000
ORI---AT----AT----(0x28)---------------
00110111010010100000000000101000 = 0x377a0028

and
LW $t0, $at, 0
1000 0111 0100 1010 0000 0000 0000 0000
LW----AT----T0----(0x0)----------------
10000111010010100000000000000000 = 0x874a0000

ADDI $r0, $zero, 1
0000 1000 0010 1010 0000 0000 0000 0001
ADDI--ZERO--R0----0x1------------------
00001000001010100000000000000001 = 0x082A0001

JMP $t0 is
JAL $ra, $t0
1111 1001 0111 0010 0000 0000 0000 0000
JAL---T0----RA----17'b0----------------
11111001011100100000000000000000 = 0xF9720000

GEQ $t2, $r0, $zero is
LEQ $t2, $zero, $r0
0000 0000 0010 1010 0111 0000 0001 0011
ALUI--ZERO--R0----T2-----7'b0----LEQ---
00000000001010100111000000010011 = 0x002A7013

BEQ $t2, $zero, success (success at +5 instr, so +4)
1100 0000 0000 1110 0000 0000 0000 0100
BEQ---ZERO--T2----0x4------------------
11000000000011100000000000000100 = 0xC00E0004

ADDI $t2, $zero, 0xf
0000 1000 0000 1110 0000 0000 0000 1111
ADDI--ZERO--T2----0xf------------------
00001000000011100000000000001111 = 0x080E000F

SULI $r0, $r0, 31
0100 0101 0110 1010 0000 0000 0001 1111
SULI--R0----R0----31-------------------
01000101011010100000000000011111 = 0x456A001F

SSRI $r0, $r0, 1
0101 1101 0110 1010 0000 0000 0000 0001
SULI--R0----R0----1--------------------
01011101011010100000000000000001 = 0x5D6A0001

RET is
JAL $zero, $ra
1111 1000 0011 0010 0000 0000 0000 0000
JAL---ZERO--RA----17'b0----------------
11111000001100100000000000000000 = 0xF8320000

NAND $t1, $zero, $zero is
AND $t1, $zero, $zero
0000 0000 0000 0000 0110 0000 0000 0101
ALUI--ZERO--ZERO--T1-----7'b0----AND---
00000000000000000110000000000101 = 0x00006005

and
NOT $t1, $t1
0000 0001 1000 0000 0110 0000 0000 0100
ALUI--T1----ZERO--T1-----7'b0----NOT---
00000001100000000110000000000100 = 0x01806004

NXOR $t1, $t1, $t1 is
XOR $t1, $t1, $t1
0000 0001 1000 1100 0110 0000 0000 0111
ALUI--T1----T1----T1-----7'b0----XOR---
00000001100011000110000000000111 = 0x018C6007

and
NOT $t1, $t1
0000 0001 1000 0000 0110 0000 0000 0100
ALUI--T1----ZERO--T1-----7'b0----NOT---
00000001100000000110000000000100 = 0x01806004

NOR $t1, $t1, $t1 is
OR $t1, $t1, $t1
0000 0001 1000 1100 0110 0000 0000 0110
ALUI--T1----T0----T0-----7'b0----OR----
00000001100011000110000000000110 = 0x018C6006

and
NOT $t1, $t1
0000 0001 1000 0000 0110 0000 0000 0100
ALUI--T1----ZERO--T1-----7'b0----NOT---
00000001100000000110000000000100 = 0x01806004
